name: Alice in Boardland
description:
Thank you for visiting me here!

Alice in Boardland is a dreamlike roguelike with fast paced shooting mechanics where every death brings you closer to your home.

Levels: 11 Levels + Infinite mode once you finish the game

Controls: WSAD - move; SPACE - Jump; SHIFT - run; Left Mouse Button - shoot; Right Mouse Button - Slow time.

Time to beat: 15-30 minutes

Genre: Roguelite platformer/shooter

Walkthrough/explanation:

Level are generated indefinitely or until you gain enough experience to "Press E" and lvl up.
Each time you level up you advance to the next level. Each time you advance to next level the big island with a lighthouse (on the left) will get a little closer to the player. Once you get to level 11 you will be able to reach the island/lighhouse and finish the game.
It should take around 20 minuts to get to that point.

Tested on: GPU 1080Ti, CPU 7700K, 16GB Ram

Please let me know in case of performance issues or any other bugs.

Created for the Newbies Game Jam (2022 - 2)
